definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: melt (Targum [[מוּג]] Ithp., Ps 46:7, Ps 107:26; cf. Ar. ma0ja surge (of the sea), Qor 18:99; mawjun a wave);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תָּמוּג]] Ps 46:7; [[וַתָּמוֹג]] Am 9:5; 2 ms. sf. [[וַתְּמוּגֵ֫נוּ]] Is 64:6 (but rd. prob. [[וַתְּמַגְּנֵנוּ]], v. [[[מָגַן]]] p.171 supr., and cf. Di > Du [[וַתְּמַגְּנֵנוּ]]); Inf. [[לָמוּג]] Ez Eze 21:20 ;—
melt, subj. [[אֶרֶץ]], at touch of ´[[י]] Am 9:5; at voice of ´[[י]] Ps 46:7; = faint (of heart), Ez Eze 21:20.
trans. cause to melt Is 64:6 (but v. supr.)

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נׇמוֹג]] Na 2:7 + 2 t.; 3 pl. [[נׇמׂ֫גוּ]] Ex 15:15 + 3 t.; Pt. pl. [[נְמׂגִים]] Ps 75:4 ;—melt away, fig. for be helpless, disorganized (through terror, etc.) Ex 15:15 (cf. context), Jos 2:9, Jos 2:24, 1Sa 14:16 (cf. We Dr), Je 49:23, cf. Na 2:7, Is 14:31, Ps 75:4.

definitions.title: Po‘l.
definitions.body: soften, dissolve, act.: only Impf. 2 ms. sf. (subj. God): [[בִּרְבִיבִם]] [[תְּמׂגְגֶנָּה]] Ps 65:11  thou softenest it [the earth] with showers; fig., = dissipate [[וּתְמֽׂגְגֵ֫נִי]] Job 30:22—We rds. [[וַיְמׂגֵג]] Hb Hab 3:6 for [[וַיְמׂדֶד]], v. [[מדד]]

definitions.title: Po‘. Hithpo‘l.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הִתְמׂגָ֑גוּ]] Na 1:5; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּתְמוֹגָ֑ג]] Ps 107:26; 3 fpl. [[תִּתְמוֹגַגְנׇה]] Am 9:13; —melt, subj. hills (before ´[[י]]) Na 1:5; subj. [[נֶפֶשׁ]] Ps 107:26 (in terror); hyperb. for flow Am 9:13 (of fertile hills, ‖[[הִטִּ֫יפוּ הֶהָרִים]]).
